statements: SELECT * FROM payment_info;
SELECT customer_id, card_number, card_expiry_date FROM payment_info;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, card_expiry_date, cvv FROM payment_info;
SELECT * FROM payment_info WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
SELECT card_number, cvv FROM payment_info WHERE customer_id = 6789;
SELECT * FROM payment_info WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT transaction_id, card_number FROM payment_info WHERE card_expiry_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, card_number FROM payment_info WHERE cvv = '123';
SELECT * FROM payment_info ORDER BY card_expiry_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_id, card_number FROM payment_info WHERE transaction_id IN (1, 5, 10);
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT payment_method FROM payments;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY payment_amount ASC
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_method FROM payments WHERE payment_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 AND payment_method IN ('Card', 'Cash')
SELECT user_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM payments GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_payment > 500
SELECT p.payment_id, p.payment_amount, u.username FROM payments p INNER JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY u.username ASC
SELECT * FROM PaymentInformation;
SELECT card_number, expiration_date FROM PaymentInformation ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, card_number, cvv FROM PaymentInformation WHERE cvv = 1234;
SELECT * FROM TransactionDetails WHERE status = 'success' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM UserAccounts WHERE username = 'exampleuser';
SELECT * FROM UserAccounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM UserAccounts WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM TransactionDetails ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT card_number, expiration_date FROM PaymentInformation WHERE cvv = 123;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM UserAccounts JOIN PaymentInformation ON UserAccounts.user_id = PaymentInformation.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_accounts;
SELECT method_name, is_secure FROM payment_methods;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_date FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT log_id, log_description, log_date FROM transaction_logs;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000.00;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.amount, t.log_description FROM user_accounts u JOIN payment_transactions p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN transaction_logs t ON p.transaction_id = t.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT user_id, transaction_date, status FROM transactions WHERE status = 'success'
SELECT method_name, is_secure FROM payment_methods
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date, card_number, secure_code FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE status IN ('Pending','Completed') ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT users.username, payments.amount, transactions.status FROM users JOIN payments ON users.user_id = payments.payment_id JOIN transactions ON payments.payment_id = transactions.payment_id
SELECT payment_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payments GROUP BY payment_id HAVING total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT method_name, COUNT(*) AS method_count FROM payment_methods GROUP BY method_name ORDER BY method_count DESC LIMIT 5
